page.title: 03MONTFORD BRIDGE-VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
Montford Bridge is quite a close-knit community, with many locals taking an active interest in the life of the village. One focus for this interest is the village hall which is regularly used for a variety of functions. The village has a youth club which meets once a week. The Womens' Institute makes use of the hall for their regular meetings and for activities such as Keep Fit & Weight Watchers. Dances for both older and younger generations take place regularly. The annual New Year's Eve Ballroom Dance is especially popular.
The hall was built in 1953 at a cost of Â£3573 with a Â£10,000 extension being added in 1984. Most of this money was raised by the local community.
